text: The Prime Minister of the Mutawakkilite Kingdom of Yemen was the head of government of that country in what is now northern Yemen. The Prime Minister was appointed by the King. There were seven prime ministers of North Yemen. ==Footnotes== ==See also== *Imams of Yemen *List of heads of government of Yemen ==External links== *World Statesmen - North Yemen Category:History of Yemen Category:Government of Yemen Mutawakkilite Kingdom of Yemen Prime Minister of Prime Ministers
title: Prime Minister of Mutawakkilite Kingdom of Yemen
